name: Furious Car Driving 2017
description:
Drive fast cars and enjoy a FREE car driving simulator game!

Furious Car Driving 2017 is an advanced car driving simulator with realistic physics for both sport cars and an off-road SUV.

There are more then 8 furious cars that are fully controllable and you can modify front and rear suspensions, camber, suspensions spring force and damp.

You can turn on or off the steering assistances such as ABS (Anti-lock Braking System), ESP (Electronic Stability Program), TCS (Traction Control System) and SH (Steering Helper).

You can also adjust the Maximum Speed, Maximum Brake and Maximum Torque of each super fast car!

Choose the traction type that you like: front wheel drive (FWD), rear wheel drive (RWD) or all-wheel-drive (AWD) and take the cars off-road for an excitement ride. An off-road car for driving on hills and to simulate 4x4 traction is available.

You can call this game an extreme car simulator or extreme furious car driving and you won't be wrong because you can do crazy jump over building, reach top speeds on the highway and crash into other racing cars. Choose what kind of transmission you like: manual or auto.

Get on the highway and use the nitro to drive as fast and as furious as you can in 8 super fast cars! Enjoy the advanced physics engine with incredible physics behaviour and graphics.

Drive with your car in different styles including drift mode that enables the car to drift using the hand break. All vehicles driving game means you can drive a Bus, a Van, a Truck with trailer or without a trailer, a desert buggy, a SUV or a Sedan. Furious car racing is a great way to spend some time gaming and driving a fast cars.

If you like car driving games with cars that crush, get damage and do amazing drifts then try this free car driving simulator game! Race fast, drive Furious!

Top Features
- Over 22 vehicles available!
- Incredible vehicles
- Full HD graphics
- HUD Camera
- Realistic sounds
- Controllable car behavior: simulator, racing, arcade, drift, fun and custom.
- Realistic physics
- offline game
- free game without wifi

Mobimi Games makes offline games that can be played for free by adults and kids (boys and girls). Enjoy our free games that works with no wifi connection and don't forget to leave us some feedback so we can update our games! Have fun!
